text: Egha me gumazamizir kaba vaghvagha korotiar ghurghurir ruariba me ganɨngi, egha kamagh me mɨgei, “Ia tong orarkɨva avughsɨ ikɨ. Apaniba ian adarazi ko ia ko ingari darazi mɨsueghtɨ me arɨmɨghiregham, mati me ia mɨsoghezɨ mokɨn. God, gumazamizir apaniba me mɨsueghtɨ arɨmɨghiramibar namba gɨfogha gɨfa, eghtɨ apaniba gumazamizir kabav sueghtɨ me arɨmɨghireghtɨ, God ian ghuzimɨn ivezim ikarvagham.”
